author: GameSpot
description:
Tune in for all of the latest Call of Duty news and gameplay at the Call of Duty Next Showcase airing on September 30th, at 9am PT. We'll get reveals including: COD Black Ops 7 Multiplayer and Zombies Live Gameplay premieres, New Warzone Content and Live Gameplay, and Call of Duty Mobile 6 Year Celebration and Live Gameplay.

After the COD Next Showcase stay tuned for the CODE Bowl.
title: Call of Duty Next Showcase Live (Black Ops 7 Multiplayer, Zombies, Warzone & more)

author: GameSpot
description: The investment consortium that acquired EA is made up of Saudia Arabia's Public Investment Fund, Affinity Partners, and Silver Lake.
title: EA Just Sold Itself For $55 BILLION

author: GameSpot
description:
Reporting for duty. Teemo’s the 10th champ to hit the 2XKO roster.

2XKO is a free 2v2 fighting game featuring the iconic champions from League of Legends. Team up with or against friends for explosive 2v2 showdowns, mastering a variety of unique tag and assist mechanics to take down the enemy duo.

#2XKO #RiotGames
title: 2XKO - Teemo Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
Heart-pounding action. High-intensity combat. Destruction like you have never seen it before.

Our Hero squad goes head to head with the Pax Armata threat as they storm a war torn New York City on the brink of collapse.

This is all-out warfare. This is Battlefield 6. Deployment begins October 10.

#battlefield6 #gaming #battlefield
title: Battlefield 6: Official Launch Live Action Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
A roll of the dice, a flip of a card, a spin of the bullets in a chamber—these are among the random chances that fascinate C4SH, the first of two new Vault Hunters coming to Borderlands 4.

Revealed during the Borderlands 4 panel at Tokyo Game Show 2025, C4SH is included in the first Story Pack, Mad Ellie and the Vault of the Damned, which is planned to launch in Q1 2026. This Story Pack is one of many additions outlined in our Post-Launch Roadmap, and features multiple main and side missions set in a new zone of Kairos, the brand-new Vault Hunter C4SH, new gear to earn, and a bunch of new cosmetics to collect.

Here are the ways you can add C4SH to your Vault Hunter roster when he's available in Q1 2026:
🎲 Own (or upgrade to) the Borderlands 4 Super Deluxe Edition
🎲 Own the Vault Hunter Pack (included in Super Deluxe Edition)
🎲 Own Story Pack 1: Mad Ellie and the Vault of the Damned (included in Vault Hunter Pack)

🔹 Animation by Rupert Gruber - a freelance Illustrator and Art Direct
title: Borderlands 4 - C4SH Vault Hunter Reveal Trailer
